data.text: @mrsjmasters @professor_dave @sciencetchr21 If you can’t test, you can’t have covid, and then the numbers go down, and the pandemic is over. #ToryLogic
@professor_dave 18 yr old daughter tested positive this morning, three different LFTs from different boxes, strong line, first time it’s hit our household

@professor_dave Interesting research piece on R4 today about how Covid changes parts of the brain - think we will be learning more and more about its impact as time goes on. Hope you are ok - with isolating as much as anything else!
@DrMagsMaguire @professor_dave @SamLP LFT shows up in nhs app so must be part of record.

@professor_dave Cases are high in Scotland but possibly because we are at least still testing and recording. My mums care home has lots of Covid cases and she herself is positive tho asymptomatic. It really has not gone away at all

@mrsjmasters @sciencetchr21 Yep - I've had other parents say their kids have had similar to the 9yo but they didn't test because they didn't probably think it was Covid and didn't have any test kits any more.
@professor_dave @sciencetchr21 And that’s just the people who are still bothering to test…

@professor_dave Most medics won’t say it’s mild. It can still be nasty but vaccination is protecting us from the worst. I am quite concerned by the current upturn but think we won’t really know the impact now until we look at death data a few weeks down the line.
